Progress

  • July 6, 2015

    Launched Keepers Record Club

    My monthly, artist-curated vinyl record subscription service that officially launched on this day.

  • July 1, 2012

    Assumed role of Archive Manager

    Caretaker for Widespread Panic's physical and digital archive of materials.

  • August 1, 2011

    Audio Engineer

    Beginning in 2011 through 2014 I recorded, mixed, and mastered various projects with local and national acts at Chase Park Transduction.

  • September 1, 2010

    Music Production through Berklee Music

    Attended online courses for a music production at Berklee Music.

  • June 1, 2008

    Became Product Manager

    Began overseeing Widespread Panic's live archive product releases through the Widespread Records label.

  • January 1, 2008

    Began work as a Web Developer

    Began my official unofficial side hustle as web developer.

  • January 1, 2007

    Promoted to Project Manager

    Expanded role at Brown Cat, Inc. to Project Manager to oversee a wider array of the group's endeavors.

  • June 1, 2006

    Started working for Widespread Panic

    Began work as New Media Director at Widespread Panic / Brown Cat, Inc.

  • May 22, 2006

    College Graduation

    Graduated from the University of Georgia with a B.B.A in Management.
